Question: Following ****'s death, Debra Opri, the lawyer for Larry Birkhead, asked for an emergency DNA sample to be taken from her body.
Hints: The request was denied by a judge, who instead ordered this person's body preserved until February 20.
In late 2006, this person was granted permanent resident status in the Bahamas by Immigration Minister Shane Gibson.
Tabloids speculated that this person was under the influence of pills or some other controlled substance.
